project_abstract.cdata: The project's objectives are to improve access to basic health services, enhance service delivery and strengthen the Ministry of Health's management capacity. The project will involve two components: (i) the reorganization and expansion of provincial health services in ten underserved provinces; and (ii) institutional development of the Ministry of Health, focussing on training and curriculum development, management information systems, and applied studies. Specifically, the loan will finance; (i) construction or expansion of provincial health facilities and training centers; (ii) furniture, equipment and vehicles for the above facilities; (iii) technical assistance, overseas and local training, and applied research; and (iv) project monitoring and evaluation.
